nodes.text: Badlands was an Imperial CR90 corvette during the Galactic Civil War. Commanded by Commander Kraven, Badlands served under Garreth Holtz's Corrupter Task Force.
The Badlands accompanied the Corrupter during her pursuit of the Defiance Task Force after the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY. It was present during a successful Rebel raid on the fleet.
